summary: This bill, the Appraisal Industry Improvement Act, amends the National Housing Act to authorize state-licensed appraisers to conduct appraisals for FHA-insured mortgages and ensures compliance with appraisal education requirements. It also addresses annual registry fees for appraisal management companies, incorporates state credentialed trainee appraisers, and provides grants for workforce and training initiatives within the appraisal industry. Finally, the bill amends the Federal Financial Institutions Examination Council Act regarding the Appraisal Subcommittee.
